Detailed Description

Obsolete with APOXI 2.9 The AtlLabelListWindow adds a label to the list entries. The items are displayed one by one (only one item is visible on the screen) together with the specified label. As this is a very specific solution, which cannot meet all customer requirements, the AtlLabelListWindow is now marked as obsolete and will not be maintained anymore. The concrete requirements for such a window are highly customer dependent, hence the desired behaviour should be provided by the MMI itself
